pkgmetadata.longdescription: Polynomially Bounded Rank Aggregation under Kemeny's Axiomatic Approach // Polynomially bounded algorithms to aggregate complete rankings under Kemeny's axiomatic framework. 'RankAggSIgFUR' (pronounced as rank-agg-cipher) contains two heuristics algorithms: FUR and SIgFUR. For details, please see Badal and Das (2018) doi:10.1016/j.cor.2018.06.007.
